name: Shiranui
ability: Skill attacks have a significant chance of inflicting Burn.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a mysterious flame, legendary in the Kyushu region of Japan. Rumor has it that Shiranui was saved by a ninja spirit while one a mission. Enthralled by the ninja's stealth and graceful efficiency, Shiranui took to wearing ninja garb. Her own abilities have allowed her to recreate ninja transformation techniques, and many have remarked at how well the get-up suits her. Shiranui actively seeks out large gatherings such as festivals in the hope of gathering information that might lead to her being reunited with the ninja who saved her life. Turns out that gathering information on ninjas isn't as easy as she'd hoped...
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Defeat LVL 80, 100, 150, 175, 200 Avatar Shiranui.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Random drops after LVL 80.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "The Great Fireworks Showdown" event.

main: "My transformation techniques put a ninja to shame."
skill: "I'm no clone. I'm the real deal."
limit_break: "Look sharp—time to show you my moves!"
